name: Block Puzzle Music
description:
100% FREE! WITH SPECIAL BACKGROUND MUSIC!
Block Puzzle Music . This is a classic yet innovative game for girls play game, now with background music! This game is a special block puzzle free for enjoying girl games in free time.

Easy to play and suitable for all age . Block Puzzle Music bring for you relaxation. Once you start, you will attracted. Let's enjoy it with your friends this block puzzle free game.
Now, Block Puzzle Music available on AppStore. You can play game for FREE with your friends.

HOW TO PLAY
• Pull block on bottom and drag it to the empty space on the board.
• Try fill the row or column with block.
• Each time row or column is filled, row and column will be clear and you will get the point.
• Game will be over if there are no room for any shapes below the grid
• Each level you completed in block puzzle free you will list a new songs and the special effect come.
• Try to reach the highest score and enjoy the special songs for girl games.
√ FEATURES
• relaxing music
• Online ranking system
• Elegent design.
• Glow coloring themed puzzle
• Smoothy effects.
• Block can't be rotate.
• No time limits! No rush ! Just play!
